item.title: Narnia Challenges (part 6)
item.author: Author
item.description: The sixth and final in a multi-part walkthrough for the OverTheWire narnia levels. These write up will focus on narnia 7 level and cover a more advanced case of a format string exploit.

item.title: Narnia Challenges (part 5)
item.author: Author
item.description: The fifth in a multi-part walkthrough for the OverTheWire narnia levels. These write up will focus on narnia 7 level and cover a more advanced case of a format string exploit.

item.title: Narnia Challenges (part 4)
item.author: Author
item.description: The fourth in a multi-part walkthrough for the OverTheWire narnia levels. These write up will focus on narnia 6 level and cover another scenario of buffer overflows.

item.title: Narnia Challenges (part 3)
item.author: Author
item.description: The third in a multi-part walkthrough for the OverTheWire narnia levels. These write up will focus on narnia 5 level and the introduction of format string exploits.

item.title: Narnia Challenges (part 2)
item.author: Author
item.description: The second in a multi-part walkthrough for the OverTheWire narnia levels. These levels focus on classic exploitation techniques of binaries, e.g.: using overflows to redirect input/output, a Return-To exploit and an alternative solution using shellcode.

item.title: Creating ShellCode On Narnia
item.author: Author
item.description: A guide on creating some simple shellcode for the OverTheWire challenges - based on the book ShellCoder's Handbook.

item.title: Narnia Challenges (part 1)
item.author: Author
item.description: The first in a multi-part walkthrough for the OverTheWire narnia levels. These levels focus on classic exploitation techniques of binaries, e.g.: bufferoverflows, smashing the stack, etc.

item.title: Natas Challenges (part 4)
item.author: Author
item.description: The fourth in a multi-part walkthrough for the OverTheWire natas levels.

item.title: Natas Challenges (part 3)
item.author: Author
item.description: The third in a multi-part walkthrough for the OverTheWire natas levels.

item.title: Fixing AAC Playback with Amazon FireTV (Gen1)
item.author: Author
item.description: A quick guide showing how to get Gen1 FireTVs going with media encoded with AAC.
